comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: August Herrmann bio on Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/August_Herrmann The photo was taken in New York City, where the team owners' association met, on December 9 and 10, 1913, to hold a formal election of Pennsylvania Governor John K. Tener, a former ball player, as the new President of the National League. Another photo shows the group assembled in convention in a New York hotel ballroom: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4605960693/in/set-72157603624867509/] During a lull in the proceedings, the dapper W. F. Baker, owner of the Philadelphia Phillies, consumes a cigar: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4626422417/in/set-72157603624867509/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of August "Garry" Hermann, owner of the Cincinnati Reds baseball team, and chairman of the National Base Ball Commission:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2679860582/]
